name: bakertilly-activity-app
description: An app for recording activity and achievements daily

scripts.start: concurrently "cd xjs-server && node index.js" "cd webapp && yarn start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn run start-watch" "cd webapp && yarn start"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd webapp && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build

author: Ben Adegbaju <benadegbaju@gmail.com>
